title: PAR Technology Awarded $5.6 Million
text:
PAR Technology Awarded $5.6 Million [September 02, 2015] Tweet 
PAR Technology Corporation (NYSE:PAR) announced today that the U.S. Navy awarded its subsidiary, Rome Research Corporation (RRC), a one year extension to its current contract to provide satellite operations and maintenance services at the Naval Satellite Operations Center (NAVSOC) Headquarters located in Point Mugu, CA ( News - Alert ) and detachments at Schriever AFB, Colorado Springs, CO; Prospect Harbor, ME; and Finegayan, Guam. NAVSOC operates, manages, and maintains assigned satellites and ground systems, providing continuous, reliable, and enduring global space support, space force enhancement, and space control operations, in direct support of the Navy's Fleet, the Joint warfighter and Interagency organizations. RRC provides telemetry, tracking and satellite control services on FLTSAT, UFO, POLAR EHF and MUOS satellite constellations to ensure 24/7/365 mission capability. 
"We are delighted to be able to continue our unparalleled level of service for the U.S. Navy at the NAVSOC headquarters and detachment locations. Our operations in tracking, telemetry and commanding communication satellites as well as the management and ground system maintenance of Navy communications satellite equipment, provide a vital service to the Navy and assures uninterrupted 24/7/365 worldwide communication services to the joint warfighter," commented Ron Casciano, CEO & President of PAR Technlogy. "We are committed to delivering the U.S. Navy a cost effective solution with unsurpassed quality, value and customer satisfaction." 
ABOUT RRC 
Rome Research Corporation, headquartered in Rome, New York, is a telecommunications and information technology services company that provides on-site mission support services to the U.S. Department of Defense and other federal government agencies. RRC has over 45 years of experience, with operations at 25 locations worldwide. For more information, visit www.romeresearch.com . 
ABOUT PAR TECHNOLOGY 
PAR Technology Corporation's stock is traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol PAR. PAR's Hospitality segment has been a leading provider of restaurant and retail technology for more than 30 years. PAR offers technology solutions for the full spectrum of restaurant operations, from large chain and independent table service restaurants to international quick service chains. PAR's Hospitality business also markets hotel management systems that provide a complete suite of powerful tools for guest management, recreation management, and timeshare/condo management. In addition, PAR provides the spa industry a leading management application that was specifically designed to support the unique needs of the resort spa and day spa markets, a rapidly growing hospitality segment. Products from PAR also can be found in retailers, cinemas, cruise lines, stadiums and food service companies. PAR also provides technology solutions to the Department of Defense and other federal agencies to address evolving intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance needs, as well as being a leading provider of military communications support services.
